page.description: The SemiCircularNumberDisplay2 control can be used to display numeric data as a semi-circular chart.

description.p: The SemiCircularNumberDisplay2 control allows you to display a numeric value on a semi-circular chart. It is ideal for using in 'dashboard' type applications. You can configure the color of the control so that it changes depending on the value. For example if a numeric value is in the 'safe' zone, you might set the color to green, and if the value was in the 'danger' zone, you might set the control color to red.
Like other Data controls, the value of the SemiCircularNumberDisplay2 control can be set and read using the [{dialog.object}.setValue()] and [{dialog.object}.getValue()] methods. For example:

Configure the *[ui:Name]* and *[ui:Label]* for the control. You can optionally add multiple SemiCircularNumberDisplay2 controls by selecting *[ui:Create multiple new controls at once]*. Click *[ui:OK]* when you are satisfied with the settings.
Optionally the *[ui:Default value]* for the control. Setting can be helpful when configuring the control's display, such as the color, line width, labels, etc.
Click the [...] smart field button for the control's *[ui:Control Properties]* to configure the control.
Configure the properties for the control. When you are satisfied with your control, click *[ui:OK]* to save the changes.

section.description: The Semi-circular Number Display dialog contains several properties for customizing the display of the control.

section.title: Minimum Number
section.description: A number that defines the minimum value of the control. Default value is 0.

section.title: Maximum Number
section.description: A number that defines the maximum value of the control. Default value is 100.

section.title: Starting angle
section.description: The angle in degrees where the semi-circular number display begins relative to 12 o'clock. The default value is -90.

section.title: Ending angle
section.description: The angle in degrees where the semi-circular number display ends relative to 12 o'clock. The default value is 90.

section.title: Line Width (pixels)
section.description: The width in pixels of the bar displaying the control's value relative to the minimum and maximum values. Default value is 10.

section.title: Stretch
section.description: Whether or not the control should stretch to fill the control's container. If checked, the control will grow or shrink to fit in the defined area. If unchecked, the control will maintain a fixed width, defined by the *[ui:width]* property below.

section.title: width
section.description: Shown when *[ui:Stretch]* is unchecked. The width in pixels of the control. Default value is 500.

description.p: *[ui:Color Type]* defines how the color is determined for the control. The color shown for the value in the control can be a static value -- single color -- or dynamically set using a color range or calling a JavaScript function.

item.name: Static
item.description: A single color is used for the circular display.

item.name: Dynamic
item.description: A range of colors is used.

description.p: A custom JavaScript function is called to determine the color.

section.title: Color Incomplete
section.description: Color shown for the portion of the circular display that is "empty". Default value is #f4f4f2.

description.p: Shown when *[ui:Color Type]* is set to Dynamic. A range of colors shown for the portion of the circular display that is "full" specified as list of numeric ranges and CSS colors. Ranges are specified as *[n1..n2|color]*. All values that fall within the range are assigned the color value. section.title: Color
section.description: Shown when *[ui:Color Type]* is set to Static. The color used to fill the portion of the circular display that is "full". The color is defined as any CSS color value. Default value is #85eb85.

section.title: Show value
section.description: If checked, the value of the control is show as text in the middle of the control. By default, this property is checked.

section.title: Label Size
section.description: Shown when *[ui:Show value]* is checked. The font size in points (pt) for the displayed control value. Default value is 20.

section.title: Label decimal points
section.description: Shown when *[ui:Show value]* is checked. The number of decimal places to show for the displayed value. Default value is 0.

section.title: Label prefix
section.description: Shown when *[ui:Show value]* is checked. Text to prefix to the displayed value.

section.title: Label suffix
section.description: Shown when *[ui:Show value]* is checked. Text to append to the displayed value. Default value is "%".

section.title: Show end-point labels
section.description: If checked, displays the minimum and maximum number values at the start and end of the semi-circular number display control.
